title: Steve Bannon and Dave Walsh on AI and the Hypocrisy of Electricity Consumption of the Tech Elites - “When it Comes to Them. It Comes to the Next Money Grab, which is Artificial Intelligence" (VIDEO)

title: New AI law to be modelled on IT Act
description: India's Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) plans to introduce a comprehensive Artificial Intelligence (AI) Act to formalize the regulation of deepfakes and synthetically generated content.
content:
After formalising rules to identify, label, and regulate deepfakes and other synthetically generated content, the ministry of electronics and information technology (MeitY) will soon bring out a comprehensive legislation on Artificial Intelligence.
